pr_title: HDFS-15620. RBF: Fix test failures after HADOOP-17281

timeline.message:
HDFS-15620. RBF: Fix test failures after HADOOP-17281

Add assertj to test dependency.

timeline.bodyText: assertj is already exported in test scope for hadoop-common. I'd have expected it to be picked up.
timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: prefer an Assume.assumeTrue(unsupported, false) so it goes into the skipped stats. But, given the rest of the tests are the same, not much of an issue.
timeline.author: steveloughran
